name: Bacon Baked Beans
author: Dana
summary: I doctor up canned baked beans with apple and brown sugar to make them sticky and sweet.  This is the easiest recipe to make.
ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cook bacon in a large skillet or in the microwave until much of the grease has been released, but the bacon is still flexible
Drain on paper towels and set aside
In a 9 inch square baking dish, stir together the baked beans, onion, mustard, ketchup, brown sugar and apple
Bake uncovered for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bacon is crisp and beans are bubbling hot
